Last week was not only [Microsoft Ignite in San Francisco](https://www.thomasmaurer.ch/2025/11/driving-impact-in-the-era-of-ai-sovereign-cloud-adaptive-cloud-at-microsoft-ignite-2025/) but also [Commvault **SHIFT 2025** virtual event](https://www.commvault.com/shift-virtual) ‚Äî *The Cyber Resilience Revolution Goes Global* ‚Äî which delivered a powerful vision for how enterprises can build true resilience in the age of AI. With on-demand access now open, attendees (and anyone who missed the live broadcast) can dive into a full library of keynotes, breakout sessions, and demos ‚Äî available until **31 December 2025**.

## üîë **Keynote Highlight ‚Äî The AI Imperative: Resilience Reimagined**

In the opening keynote, Commvault CEO **Sanjay Mirchandani** explored how AI-driven enterprises operate *instantaneously, autonomously, and at massive scale.* Yet the data underpinning this evolution is increasingly complex, distributed, and vulnerable.

His main message:

> >
> **CIOs and CISOs must rethink data availability, accuracy, integrity, and trust to secure competitive AI advantage.**
> Commvault empowers organizations to **safely scale resilience** across this new AI era.
> >

## üöÄ Innovation Showcase ‚Äì The Next Standard of Resilience

During the mainstage showcase, **Pranay Ahlawat (Chief Technology & AI Officer)** and **Rajiv Kottomtharayil (Chief Product Officer)** unveiled groundbreaking innovations redefining how organizations **secure, manage, and recover data in an AI-powered world.**

- **Unified Vision**: Commvault is no longer just a backup company. With Cloud Unity, it‚Äôs delivering a platform where data security, cyber recovery, and identity resilience converge intelligently.
- **AI-First Resilience**: The event underscores that resilience in the AI era isn‚Äôt just about protecting workloads ‚Äî it‚Äôs about protecting and recovering the data foundation that underpins AI initiatives.
- **Proactive Recovery**: Rather than reactive ‚Äúrestore-from-backup‚Äù strategies, Commvault emphasizes *clean, verified, automated* recovery, reducing risk after incidents.
- **Identity as a First-Class Citizen**: By elevating identity protection and recovery, Commvault is acknowledging that protecting AD (or EntraID) is just as business-critical as protecting data.

## üì¢ Major Announcements at Commvault SHIFT Virtual

### 1. **Commvault Cloud Unity Platform**

A new unified, cloud-native platform for AI-powered resilience. With this release, Commvault brings together data protection, cyber recovery, and identity resilience in a unified, cloud-native, AI-powered platform. üìé [https://www.commvault.com/news/new-era-in-enterprise-resilience-commvault-cloud-unity-platform-release](https://www.commvault.com/news/new-era-in-enterprise-resilience-commvault-cloud-unity-platform-release?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

- **AI-enabled discovery & policy recommendations** help customers onboard workloads faster and smarter.
- **Risk analysis dashboards** give visibility into protection gaps across clouds, regions, and accounts.
- **Cost optimization**: built-in TCO analysis shows what could be saved by switching to Commvault protection.
- **Broad workload coverage**: supports 160+ cloud regions and more than 200 cloud services, plus on-prem and edge.

### 2. **Automated, Clean Cyber Recoveries**

AI helps detect threats, isolate compromised data, and orchestrate clean recovery. üìé [https://www.commvault.com/news/transforming-how-enterprises-make-clean-complete-automated-cyber-recoveries](https://www.commvault.com/news/transforming-how-enterprises-make-clean-complete-automated-cyber-recoveries?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

- Their improved **Threat Scan** uses AI to detect suspicious files, quarantine them, and identify Indicators of Compromise (IoCs), helping prevent re-injection of malicious data.
- **Synthetic Recovery** allows for surgical, intelligent rebuilding of systems after an attack ‚Äî recovering clean data, not just raw backups.

### 3. **End-to-End Identity Resilience**

Commvault is extending protection to one of the most targeted attack vectors: Active Directory (AD), Microsoft Entra, and identity systems. üìé [https://www.commvault.com/news/expanding-end-to-end-identity-resilience-detect-log](https://www.commvault.com/news/expanding-end-to-end-identity-resilience-detect-log?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

- This identity resilience functionality is deeply integrated with data protection, giving admins a unified view and control.
- The platform now **detects and audits anomalous changes** in AD (who changed what, when, and from where).
- It supports **real-time rollback** of malicious changes ‚Äî restoring AD to a clean, trusted state without manual recovery point juggling.

## üéì Breakout Session Highlights

Here are some of the most-viewed and talked-about sessions:

- **The Phoenix Protocol: What Most People Get Wrong About a Cyber Attack**
- **Protecting the AI Stack: What You Need to Know**
- **From Mishaps to Meltdown: Best Practices for AD & EntraID Recovery**
- **Introducing MTCR: The Missing Metric for Cyber Recovery Success**
- **Accelerate Incident Response with Cleanroom & Security Integrations**
- **AI Governance with Dr. Rumman Chowdhury (Humane Intelligence)**
- **The CISO Paradox: Leading Security in the Age of Personal Accountability**
- **Jay McBain ‚Äì Analyst View: Partner Ecosystem Growth**
- **Zero Trust IAM for Hybrid & Multi-Cloud**
- **Using Cloud Speed & Scale to Protect Cloud Workloads**
- **Resilient Together: Hybrid Cloud Success via the Commvault Cyber Resiliency Platform**

## üì∫ Watch Commvault SHIFT 2025 On-Demand

**Commvault SHIFT On-Demand** is now live: üëâ [https://www.commvault.com/shift-virtual](https://www.commvault.com/shift-virtual?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

What‚Äôs included:

- Full **keynote**, **breakouts**, and **demo sessions**
- Available **24/7 until 31 December 2025**
- Watch and re-watch as often as needed
- Includes subtitles in **16 languages** and translated interface

## üí° Final Thoughts

SHIFT 2025 made one thing crystal clear: üëâ **In the AI era, resilience must evolve.**

Commvault SHIFT 2025 wasn‚Äôt just a showcase ‚Äî it was a bold statement: in the AI era, cyber resilience must evolve. With the Cloud Unity platform, advanced recovery tools, and a deep integration of identity protection, Commvault is staking its claim as a leader in the future of enterprise resilience.

If you‚Äôre a CIO, CISO, cloud architect or data leader, it‚Äôs worth registering for SHIFT On-Demand and watching the sessions. The insights could shape how you build and defend your organization in the years ahead.

Commvault is redefining enterprise resilience by combining:

- **Data protection**
- **Cyber recovery**
- **Identity resilience**
- **AI-driven insights**
